resources.string: Analyzing Collection of Images from your device

Content Aware Profiling Module runs as a foreground service when the user charging its phone. The profiler processes images in batches of 500 and intermediate calculated results can be shown below before completion. The intermediate and final results are stored in the contextual ego network. Select the algorithm you want to run and request the profiler to start the process.
We need access to read and write to external storage to run the Profiling Module. The process is run on device and all results are stored locally in the internal memory.
We need access to read and metadata from picture for optimizing the results of the Profiling Module. The process is run on device and all results are stored locally in the internal memory.
The top 3 images with the highest contribution to the score of\t
